TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ResourcePermissionBase extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public MustInherit Class ResourcePermissionBase Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class ResourcePermissionBase abstract : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 允許的程式碼存取安全性權限控制。

span.span: Allows control of code access security permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別比較字串時，使用序數排序規則，並且忽略要比較之字串的大小寫。The class compares strings using ordinal sort rules and ignores the case of the strings being compared. ## Examples 下列範例會繼承類別。The following example inherits from the class. 會實作 4 種建構函式。4 kinds of constructors are implemented. 這個範例也將提供的類別中實作`MailslotPermissionEntry`。The example also provides an implementation of a class called `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 屬性然後私下設定的型別`MailslotPermissionEntry`。The property is then privately set to the type of `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 屬性私下設為 「 名稱 」 和 「 機器 」。The property is set privately to "Name" and "Machine". [!code-cpp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CPP/resourcepermissionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CS/resourcepermissionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/VB/resourcepermissionbase.vb#1)]

permission.span: 提供控制辨識項的權限。

span.span: for the right to control evidence.

para.span: 當您繼承自，您必須提供至少三個建構函式，設定兩個屬性，並提供第三個屬性。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must provide at least three constructors, set two properties, and provide a third property.

para.span: 必要的建構函式： 預設建構函式，另一個則接受做為參數，以及許多視需要採取的屬性值。

span.span: The required constructors are: a default constructor, one that takes a as a parameter, and as many as needed that take values for the properties.
The properties that need to be set are and .

para.span: 需要第三個屬性是一個傳回的權限項目。

span.span: The third property that is needed is one that returns the permission entries.

para.span: 如需此類別的實作的範例，請參閱。

span.span: In , the property is set privately to "Machine" and "Category", the property is privately set to the type of , and the property returns the permission entries.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前使用權限物件的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.
A copy of the current permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權限物件的複本以原始的權限物件的資源表示相同的存取權。A copy of the permission object represents the same access to resources as the original permission object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 與目前使用權限物件相同型別的使用權限物件。

span.span: A permission object of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前使用權限物件和目標使用權限物件交集的使用權限物件。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission object that is the intersection of the current permission object and a target permission object.

returns.span: 新使用權限物件，表示目前物件和指定目標的交集。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current object and the specified target.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，則這個物件是 。

span.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限物件的交集會描述一組都保留在一般作業的權限。The intersection of two permission objects is a permission that describes the set of operations they both hold in common. 具體來說，它代表要傳遞這兩個權限的要求所需的最低權限。Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions required for a demand to pass both permissions.

exception.span: 與目前使用權限物件不同型別的目標使用權限物件。

span.span: The target permission object is not of the same type as the current permission object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 將測試子集關聯性 (Relationship) 的使用權限物件。

span.span: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

summary.span: 判斷目前使用權限物件是否為指定使用權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前使用權限物件是指定使用權限物件的子集則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前權限物件指定一組完全指定權限物件所包含的作業，目前的權限物件是指定權限物件的子集。The current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object if the current permission object specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission object. 例如，表示 C:\Example.txt 的存取權限是到 c： 代表存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\Example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限物件，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限物件。If this method returns `true`, the current permission object represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission object. 這個方法一律會傳回`false`時的類型不同於目前權限物件的指定權限物件。This method always returns `false` when the specified permission object is of a different type than that of the current permission object.

span.span: if permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限物件代表的存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission object represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 與目前使用權限物件結合的使用權限物件。

span.span: A permission object to combine with the current permission object.

param.span: 它必須與目前的使用權限物件為相同的型別。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 建立將目前使用權限物件和目標使用權限物件相結合的使用權限物件。

span.span: Creates a permission object that combines the current permission object and the target permission object.

returns.span: 新使用權限物件，表示目前使用權限物件和指定使用權限物件的聯集。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表目前權限物件和指定的權限物件所代表的所有作業的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission object and the specified permission object. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 與目前使用權限物件不同型別的 使用權限物件。

span.span: The permission object is not of the same type as the current permission object.
